header.message: @drhoagie @wkrn Scary part is, the people who search you at the airport may be meth addicts or have the chemicals on them. Not good. #TSA
Mystery surrounds man's disappearance in Smokies

body.title: Mystery surrounds man's disappearance in Smokies
body.description: A handwritten note asking that no one search for him was left in the car of Blount County man who disappeared in the Smokies, but officials have not yet determined whether Derek Lueking wrote it.

header.user: Let Us Know What You Think
header.message: Should TSA agents be required to have a college degree in law enforcement?

question.text: Should TSA agents be required to have a college degree in law enforcement?
